steps.name: the user is on the Wikionary home page
the user looks up the definition of the word 'apple'
they should see the definition 'A common, round fruit produced by the tree Malus domestica, cultivated in temperate climates.'

arguments.val: A common, round fruit produced by the tree Malus domestica, cultivated in temperate climates.

steps.name: the user is on the Wikionary home page
the user looks up the definition of the word 'pear'
they should see the definition 'An edible fruit produced by the pear tree, similar to an apple but elongated towards the stem.'

arguments.val: An edible fruit produced by the pear tree, similar to an apple but elongated towards the stem.

steps.name: the user is on the Wikionary home page
the user looks up the definition of the word 'mango'
they should see the definition 'A tropical Asian fruit tree, Mangifera indica.'

arguments.val: A tropical Asian fruit tree, Mangifera indica.

steps.name: the user is on the Wikionary home page
the user looks up the definition of the word 'cucumber'
they should see the definition 'The edible fruit of this plant, having a green rind and crisp white flesh.'

arguments.val: The edible fruit of this plant, having a green rind and crisp white flesh.

name: Lookup a definition
description:
In order to talk better
  As an English student
  I want to look up word definitions

elements.name: Should list items related to a specified keyword

steps.name: I want to buy a wool scarf
I search for items containing 'wool'
I should only see items related to 'wool'

elements.name: Should list items related to a specified keyword

steps.name: I want to buy a wool scarf
I search for items containing 'shoes'
I should only see items related to 'shoes'

elements.name: Should list items related to a specified keyword

steps.name: I want to buy a wool scarf
I search for items containing 'suits'
I should only see items related to 'suits'

elements.name: Should list items related to a specified keyword

steps.name: I want to buy a wool scarf
I search for items containing 'garments'
I should only see items related to 'garments'

elements.name: Should list items related to a specified keyword

steps.name: I want to buy a wool scarf
I search for items containing 'toys'
I should only see items related to 'toys'

they select the product to puchase
